author: Bloomberg News
title: U.S. stock futures rebound, dollar drops on Fed pledge to support economy
description: S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 futures had earlier fallen to their daily limits, but they gradually recovered before the Fed news helped them erase all their losses
content: U.S. equity futures reversed a decline and Treasuries extended an advance after the Federal Reserve on Monday announced a massive second wave of initiatives to support a shuttered American economy. The dollar turned lower and Europe stocks trimmed a drop on t… [+3867 chars]
